Name: Dots in line
About the game: Dots in line - is a simple and clear puzzle game where colored dots should be joined in a row vertically or horizontally. The game has a great relaxing and calming effect, and thanks to the saving option, you can interrupt the game at any moment with no fear of losing your results. - Simple gameplay - Saving progress - Nice colours
